moves.name: Clamp
moves.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Whirlpool
moves.description: Traps foes in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
